name: The Escape Of Subject55
description:
Subject55 is one of the many Subjects throughout the facility, except one problem.
He can feel emotions like a human....

This Game is a reboot of my 1st ever game "Escape of Subject55"
I worked really hard on it and I will have to say 
this is probably the best game I made yet. I hope you guys enjoy it

Music In This Game 
"Your Boy" by Infraction
"Synthetic Pleasures" by MOKKA
"Virtual Reality" by Infraction
"Almost Evil" by Infraction
"2077" by Infraction
"The Riot" by Infraction
"Can You Feel" by Infraction
